SELECT v.vehicle_number carNumber, rs.is_online `online`, ss.`status` `status`, fn_type2name ( 'carStatus', ss.`status` ) statusName FROM tbl_vehicle v LEFT JOIN tbl_vehicle_realtime_status rs ON v.id = rs.vehicle_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.vehicle_id, t.`status` FROM tbl_vehicle_seal_status t WHERE t.vehicle_id = ( SELECT id FROM tbl_vehicle WHERE vehicle_number = #{carNumber} ) ORDER BY t.trigger_time DESC LIMIT 1 ) ss ON v.id = ss.vehicle_id WHERE v.vehicle_number = #{carNumber}

SELECT t.`status` FROM ( ( SELECT `status`, trigger_time `time` FROM tbl_vehicle_seal_status WHERE vehicle_id = #{carId} ORDER BY trigger_time DESC, id DESC LIMIT 1 ) UNION ( SELECT vehicle_status `status`, track_time `time` FROM tbl_vehicle_newest_track WHERE vehicle_id = #{carId} ) ) t ORDER BY t.time DESC LIMIT 1;
